metadata.title: CVE-2014-7847 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: iplookup/index.php in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.6, and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (resource consumption) by triggering the calculation ofan estimated latitude and longitude for an IP address.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
